alert.note: Alert for Northern El Paso County, Monument Ridge, Rampart Range Below 7500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 16 at 3:43AM MST until February 17 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 5 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches with amounts up to 6 inches in the greater Monument area. * WHERE...Northern El Paso County. * WHEN...From 3 PM Wednesday to 5 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Northern El Paso County, Monument Ridge, Rampart Range Below 7500 Ft
